TitleAndOnePlan.description: Internxt is an open-source cloud storage provider with post-quantum encryption to keep your data private.

TitleAndOnePlanV2.title: Private cloud storage solutions to protect your data

title.line2: for your files, pictures, and more

subtitle.line1: Storing, backing up, and sharing your files in total privacy couldn’t be any easier. With Internxt Drive, you
subtitle.line2: get user-friendly storage, post-quantum encryption, and full control over your files and data.

WhySwitchSection.title: Why you should switch to private cloud storage solutions
WhySwitchSection.subtitle: Switching to private cloud storage solutions guarantees your data stays private and secure from hackers and corporations. Unlike Google, Apple, or Microsoft, Internxt doesn’t collect, sell, or misuse your data. You have complete control over your files.
WhySwitchSection.description: Invest in your privacy and get peace of mind that your files and data are protected against data breaches.

title.line1: Internxt offers private cloud storage solutions

WhatWeDo.subtitle: Google, Microsoft, Apple, and other cloud storage service providers are exploiting your data for profit. Switch to Internxt to get total control of your privacy.

square1.title: Internxt Drive
square1.description: We offer affordable annual and lifetime cloud storage to store, share, back up, and sync your files. Drive also includes a premium VPN and antivirus, for complete privacy and protection online.

square2.title: Internxt for Business
square2.description: Internxt for Business is a GDPR cloud storage solution that protects confidential information and includes 2TB of storage for up to 100 users. Thanks to award-winning encryption, Internxt protects your company from data breaches.

square3.title: Internxt S3
square3.description: Internxt S3 is an end-to-end encrypted and scalable object storage service for businesses or enterprises to manage large data at lower costs. With zero ingress and egress fees, our object storage plans are up to 80% cheaper than other providers.

FeaturesSection1.title: Why Internxt stands out as the most secure and private cloud storage
FeaturesSection1.description: Internxt integrates advanced privacy features to offer the most secure cloud storage for your peace of mind.

info.title: Award-winning encryption
info.description: Our system is built with Kyber 512 post-quantum cryptography, the best encryption standard chosen by the NIST Institute to protect against the future threats of quantum computers, which could theoretically break the current encryption protocols used by other cloud storage service providers. Secure your data with Internxt to future-proof the privacy of your files.

info.title: No more reliance on Big Tech
info.description: Other cloud storage service providers, Google, Dropbox, etc, profit from your data, storing and analyzing your files, leading to emails and other personal information leaking online. Internxt is different. With anonymous account creation and a strict no-tracking policy, we don’t store, share, or monetize your data in any way.

info.title: Accessible from anywhere
info.description: Download Internxt Drive from your favorite cloud storage app to access the cloud on Windows, Mac, Linux, iOS, or Android. We also offer other private cloud storage solutions with WebDAV and Rclone support, allowing you to manage your files effortlessly across multiple devices, automate backups, and access your data remotely.

info.title: Open source and audited
info.description: Other cloud storage platforms hide their source code from the public, meaning you can never truly know how they handle your data or what they do with your files. Internxt promises full transparency, as the source code for all our products is publicly available on GitHub. Internxt is also verified as a secure platform by Securitum, an independent penetration testing company.

info.title: Sustainability
info.description: Our commitment to building a better future built on online privacy also extends to our commitment to a greener future. Our data centers use renewable energy sources such as nuclear and hydroelectricity. Using environmentally friendly technology helps our commitment to build a more sustainable future and be climate-neutral by 2050.

info.title: GDPR compliant
info.description: Based in Valencia, Spain, Internxt ensures your data is private and secure by complying with GDPR data protection laws. A personal Drive account keeps your information private with no tracking, sharing, or unauthorized access and, for businesses, reduces the risk of fines and legal issues for businesses.

FeaturesSection.title: Why use a secure VPN
FeaturesSection.subtitle: Unsecured internet connections, such as Public Wi-Fi, can expose your information to data leaks, hacks, or breaches. Internxt’s VPN encrypts your connection for a safer, more private online experience.
FeaturesSection.description: Internxt’s free VPN encrypts your connection for a safer, more private online experience.

cards.title: Encrypt your internet traffic
cards.description: We encrypt your data to protect your right to privacy and keep your browsing activity hidden from hackers, ISPs, and Google.

cards.title: Avoid targeted advertising
cards.description: A secure VPN helps you avoid personalized ads and reduces data collection from companies like Google.

cards.title: Unlock Global Content
cards.description: Bypass geo-restrictions and access websites unavailable in your region.

cards.title: Control your online identity
cards.description: Internxt’s secure VPN gives you back control over how much information you share online and keeps it protected.

CtaSection1.title: Interested in private cloud solutions?
CtaSection1.description: Internxt Drive protects you with post-quantum encryption, antivirus, and VPN.

CtaSection2.title: Protect your privacy with Internxt Drive
CtaSection2.description: Secure your files with post-quantum encryption and regain control over your data today.

faq.question: Is Internxt an alternative to Google Drive?
answer: Yes, Internxt is an alternative to Google Drive and other Big Tech companies. These companies encrypt data on servers they own, meaning they can access your account and view your files or give access to your account to the government if requested.

Unlike these cloud storage platforms, Internxt uses post-quantum and zero-knowledge encryption, so only you can access your files. Your data is encrypted on your device before being uploaded, and no one can view or decrypt it, not even Internxt. This ensures complete privacy, prevents unauthorized access, and protects you from data breaches and surveillance.

faq.question: What is post-quantum encryption?
answer: Post-quantum encryption uses cryptographic algorithms to secure data against the threat of quantum computers that could potentially break traditional encryption methods. Post-quantum encryption focuses on developing algorithms that prevent these computers from decrypting and accessing your data.
This method is ideal for private cloud storage solutions like Internxt because it ensures your data remains secure despite advancing quantum computing technology.

faq.question: What’s the difference between Internxt for Business and Internxt S3?
answer: Internxt for Business is a cloud storage solution tailored for companies, offering team collaboration, admin controls, and other features to protect businesses from data breaches.

Internxt S3 is a cloud-based storage system that follows the Amazon S3 protocol. It is ideal for developers and enterprises that need to scale and integrate storage into their applications or services and store data lakes or warehouses.
The main difference is that Internxt for Business focuses on team-oriented features, while Internxt S3 provides scalable storage solution up to 90% cheaper than AWS, Azure, or Google Cloud.

faq.question: Why should you choose Internxt over other cloud platforms?
answer: All our private cloud storage solutions emphasize privacy, so we offer you complete control over your privacy with Kyber 512 post-quantum encryption, future-proofing your personal or business data against potential quantum computing threats.

Internxt is GDPR compliant, reducing legal risks, and offers scalable, cost-effective solutions like Internxt S3, with zero ingress and egress fees and a pay-as-you-go pricing model. Additionally, its open-source nature, independent security audits, and commitment to sustainability make it a reliable and transparent choice for enterprises.

faq.question: What’s included with Internxt’s private cloud storage solutions?
answer: Internxt paid subscription and lifetime plans offer post-quantum encrypted cloud storage, an ultra-fast unlimited VPN for up to 5 locations, antivirus, and future access to our Mail and Meet products for Premium and Ultimate plans.

faq.question: Can I add more storage to my lifetime plan?
answer: Yes, Internxt lifetime plans are stackable, so you can add as much storage as you want to your Internxt lifetime membership. You can purchase them with the same email address as your current lifetime account.
Contact us at hello@internxt.com so we can stack them together for you on the same account.

faq.question: Can I pay with credit card, PayPal, or cryptocurrency?
answer: Internxt currently accepts debit and credit cards (Mastercard, VISA, American Express, etc). You can also pay via PayPal, iDEAL, Sofort, and Cryptocurrency.
